pages.text: Like the $(l:modules/fluid_1)Fluid Module Mk1/$, this module can transfer fluids into or out of the router, if it has a fluid-containing item in the buffer. However, this module can also target more distant locations, up to 12 blocks away (up to 24 with $(l:augments/range_up)Range Up Augments/$).

$(thing)Sneak-right-click/$ any block with the module to set its target.$(p)Note that the target block does not necessarily need to be a fluid tank; if you break the block after setting the module target, the module will be able to empty a bucket of fluid into the world at that location.
